content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, there may be some resistance from educators to implement these changes due to different factors such as lack of resources, training, and time. Additionally, some educators may be hesitant to change their teaching methods or curriculum that they have been using for years. However, it is important to note that many educators recognize the need for change to better prepare students for the workforce of the 21st century, and there are also various initiatives and programs that are already being implemented to achieve this goal. Collaboration and support from all stakeholders, including educators, policymakers, and parents, are essential to successfully implement these changes.
